ai-patthana16.4:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.4:0.3_0: There are necessities for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana16.4:1.1_0: And they don’t cause or reason for the sake of skillful quality cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:1.1_1: And it’s skillful thing that gives rise to causes and reasons.
ai-patthana16.4:1.1_2: And they don’t arise because of the skillful teaching or for the sake of themselves.
ai-patthana16.4:2.1_0: Then the unskillful qualities that arise because of the unskillful and not the cause or reason for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana16.4:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the reason for the sake of deterioration, both for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana16.4:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the reason for the sake of deterioration, both for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana16.4:3.1_2: There’s no cause or reason for this.
ai-patthana16.4:5.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana16.4:5.1_1: It’s skillful thing that doesn’t cause or condition for the sake of declaring principle. For the reason for the sake of cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.4:5.1_2: It’s skillful and unskillful phenomena don’t arise because of lack of ancestors, nor for the sake of decessary, nor for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:6.1_0: Not Completely understanding the unskillful and not the cause or reason for the sake of both unskillful and its cause.
ai-patthana16.4:6.1_1: Not Completely for teaching or for the sake of deterioration, nor for the sake of causes and reason.
ai-patthana16.4:6.1_2: Not knowing and seeing the unskillful, they don’t arise because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.4:7.1_0: No causes and reason for this.
ai-patthana16.4:7.1_1: No causes and conditions for the sake of undeclared; both for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana16.4:7.1_2: Not declared by the cause or condition for the reason. Formless, unskillful qualities don’t arise because of cause or reason.
